Sentencas: Ethanol steam reforming with/without co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area (HSA) CeO2 support, synthesized via a surfactant-assisted method, (Ni/CeO2 (HSA)) was studied under solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) operating conditions for later application as an instack reforming catalyst.
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support

Sentencas: The catalyst provides considerably higher reforming reactivity and excellent resistance towards carbon deposition in comparison with Ni/Al2O3 and Ni on conventional ceria (Ni/CeO2 (low surface area; LSA)).
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support

Sentencas: At the temperature above 800 degrees C, the main products from the reforming processes over Ni/CeO2 (HSA) were H-2, CO, and CO2 with some amount of CH4 depending on the inlet steam/ethanol and cofed reactant (i.e. O-2 and H-2)/ethanol ratios, whereas high hydrocarbon compound i.e. C2H4 was also observed from the reforming of ethanol over Ni/CeO2 (LSA) and Ni/Al2O3.
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support

Sentencas: An addition Of O-2 (as oxidative steam reforming) and H-2 significantly reduced the degree of carbon deposition.
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support

Sentencas: The presence of both reactants also promoted the conversions of hydrocarbon presented in the system (i.e. CH4 and C2H4) to CO and H-2.
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support

Sentencas: The major consideration of these additions is the suitable co-fed reactant/C2H5OH ratio.
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support

Sentencas: The presence of too high oxygen concentration could oxidize Ni particles to NiO, which resulted in a lower reforming reactivity, and also combusts H-2 to H2O.
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support
Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support

Sentencas: C2H5OH molar ratio for the oxidative steam reforming of Ni/CeO2 was 0.4, which is less than that of Ni/Al2O3.
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support

Sentencas: An addition of too high hydrogen content slightly decreased the catalyst activity, which could be due to the active site competition of nickel particle and the inhibition of gas-solid redox reactions between the gaseous hydrocarbon components with the lattice oxygen (O-O(x)) on the surface Of CeO2 support in the case of Ni/CeO2.
Titulo: Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support
Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support
Steam reforming of ethanol with co-fed oxygen and hydrogen over Ni on high surface area ceria support
